ARABIC: فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You will soon know who will receive a punishment which disgraces him and find unleashed against himself an everlasting punishment.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You will soon come to know who suffers the punishment that would put him to shame, and who suffers lasting torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You will come to know who will be struck by a humiliating chastisement, and who will be subjected to an unceasing torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You will soon learn who will face a humiliating punishment and will be encompassed by an everlasting torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So now you will come to know – upon whom comes the punishment that disgraces him, and upon whom descends the punishment that continues forever.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And you will know who it is on whom will come a torment that will cover him with disgrace and on whom will fall a lasting torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So shall you know who it is on whom will come a chastisement which will disgrace him, and on whom will lasting chastisement come down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and you shall know to whom will come a chastisement degrading him, and upon whom there shall alight a lasting chastisement.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And ye shall know to whom a punishment that will confound him cometh, and upon whom a lasting doom will fall.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: you will soon come to know who will receive a humiliating punishment, and find unleashed against him an everlasting punishment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So presently ye shall know on whom cometh a torment that humiliateth him, and on whom is let loose a torment lasting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Soon you will know whom a disgraceful punishment will overtake and on whom a lasting punishment will descend.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But soon will ye know who it is on whom will descend a penalty that will cover them with shame,- on whom will be unloosed a penalty lasting:"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And you will know who it is on whom will come a torment that will cover him with disgrace and on whom will fall a lasting torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You shall know to whom a degrading punishment will come, and upon whom an everlasting punishment will fall'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “You will surely know upon whom will come a torment that will abase him, and upon whom will fall a lasting torment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you are going to know who will get a punishment that will disgrace him [on earth] and upon whom will descend an enduring punishment [in the Hereafter]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:39] and you shall know to whom (man introduces the relative clause which constitutes the direct object of the [action of] ‘knowing’) will come a chastisement degrading him, and upon whom an enduring, an everlasting, chastisement will fall’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And ye shall know to whom a punishment that will confound) humiliate and destroy (him cometh, and upon whom a lasting doom) in the Hereafter (will fall) will be enjoined upon.
